name: ACYMailing
description: Automatically adds user to different mailing lists that exists in AcyMailing according to their subscription plans and subscription status.

name: ACYMailing 6
description: It's integrated with AcyMailing version 6.x. Automatically adds user to different mailing lists that exists in AcyMailing according to their subscription plans and subscription status.

name: AltaUserPoints (AUP)
description: Assigns AltaUserPoints (AUP) based on user's active subscription.

name: AltaUserPoints (AUP) Discount
description: Converts AltaUserPoints (AUP) points into discount.

name: Basic Tax
description: Allows you to apply different taxation rates for the different countries.

name: EasyBlog Post Submission Restriction
description: Restricts the allowed number of blog submissions in EasyBlog based on user subscription.

name: EasyBlog Category Access Restriction
description: Disallow user access to selected EasyBlog categories depending on user subscription.

name: Content ACL
description: Allow or disallow user access to the available content (articles or categories) on the site depending on user subscription.

name: EasyDiscuss Badges
description: Assign EasyDiscuss badges to users whenever they subscribe to and activate certain plans.

name: EasyDiscuss Ticket Submission Restriction
description: Allows admin to restrict number of EasyDiscuss tickets can be created per day by a user according to user subscription.

name: EasySocial Profile Types
description: Assigns EasySocial profile type to users based on their subscription.

name: EasySocial Badges
description: Assign EasySocial badges to users whenever they subscribe to and activate certain plans.

name: EasySocial Groups
description: Allows you to assign Easysocial Groups according to user subscription.

name: EasySocial Points
description: Allocate EasySocial points to users when they purchased a specific plan in PayPlans.

name: EasySocial Groups Submission Restriction
description: Allows you to restrict number of Easysocial Groups can be created by a user according to user subscription.

name: EasySocial Pages Submission Restriction
description: Allows you to restrict number of Easysocial Pages can be created by a user according to user subscription.

name: EasySocial Events Submission Restriction
description: Allows you to restrict number of Easysocial Events can be created by a user according to user subscription.

name: EasySocial Marketplace Submission Restriction
description: Allows you to restrict number of Easysocial Marketplace can be created by a user according to user subscription.

name: EasySocial Advertisement Submission Restriction
description: Allows you to restrict number of Easysocial Advertisement can be created by a user according to user subscription.

name: European Union Value Added Tax (EU VAT)
description: Allows you to assign different taxation rates for both personal or business based on EU standards.

name: Friend subscription
description: Allows user's to purchase subscription for friends.

name: Google Analytics
description: Allows you to track user behavior across your e-commerce store on Google Analytics.

name: JEvents
description: Restrict category access and perform specific tasks based on user subscription.

name: JomSocial MultiProfile Types
description: Assign JomSocial multi-profile type according to user subscription.

name: Joomla User Type
description: Allows you to assign Joomla user groups according to user subscription.

name: Joomla Article Submission Restriction
description: Controls the number of joomla article entries a user can submit depending on their subscribed plans.

name: JReviews
description: Restricts media uploads and the number of post submissions for a particular category based on user subscription.

name: Kunena
description: Assign specific category access in Kunena based on user subscription.

name: K2 Category Access Control
description: Grants user access to different categories in K2 depending on user subscription.

name: K2 Item Access Control
description: Grants user access to different items and categories in K2 depending on user subscription.

name: K2 Usergroup Access Control
description: Assigns different K2 user groups based on user subscription.

name: MailChimp
description: Assigns users to different mailing lists based on user subscription.

name: Mailster
description: Assign users to different mailing lists based on user subscription.

name: Menu Access
description: Displays menu items based on user subscription.

name: Module Access
description: Displays modules based on user subscription.

name: Mosets Tree
description: Limits the number of submissions of total listing, featured listing, and category listing based on plans.

name: Phoca Download
description: Assigns access and upload rights for specific categories according to user subscription.

name: Post Affiliate Pro
description: Keeps track of clicks and sales in PayPlans.

name: SobiPro
description: Controls the number of entries a user can submit depending on their subscribed plans.

name: Terms & Conditions
description: Create multiple terms and conditions for different plans across the site.

name: VirtueMart
description: Assign specific Shopper Groups to users based on their subscription status.

name: ZOO
description: Manage the visibility and post submission access for specific ZOO categories according to user subscription.

name: DJ Classifieds Points
description: Allocate DJ Classified points to users when they purchased a specific plan in PayPlans.

name: EasySocial Storage Limit
description: Manage the maximum upload storage limit in EasySocial according to user subscription.

name: EasySocial File Upload Limit
description: Manage the maximum of file upload size limit in EasySocial according to user subscription.

name: EasySocial User Points Modifier
description: Manage the user points assignment by giving extra X times points in EasySocial according to user subscription.
